title: RFC 1034 and 1035
extract: About DNS (RFC 1034 - RFC 1035) - Domain Name System. Permalink. The Domain Name System (DNS) is a hierarchical decentralized naming system for computers, services, or any resource connected to the Internet or a private network.
extract_html: About DNS (RFC 1034 - RFC 1035) - Domain Name System. Permalink. The Domain Name System (DNS) is a hierarchical decentralized naming system for computers, services, or any resource connected to the Internet or a private network.
